name: Tilk: Aoi Umi kara Kita Shoujo
overview: Tilk - Aoi Umi Kara Kita Shoujo is a tactical RPG game that was released for the Playstation and Saturn consoles in 1997, Tilk basically means a small girl that came from the blue sea. The game begins with Billy Drake (the main character of the game) joins his friends (Merril Fount, Font Tohkung, Pack Myson, Glutch Gantoh) and they all decide to go to Rogear Danco's corral, they talk to him and after that they encounter the first battle of the game against some wolves that are attacking his animals. The gameplay is the classic in a Tactical RPG, to advance in the game plot the player has to defeat the enemies in the battles, before the battle starts the player can choose which party he will use in it and equip his team before the battle begins, during the battles each player's character got a limited range of movement and when his character got an enemy on attack range the player can select the attack type that his character will use. MAIN CHARACTERS: - Billy Drake - Merril Fount - Font Tohkung - Pack Myson - Glutch Gantoh - Silky Retty - Manna Drake - Dick Drake - Mearly Valentine - Edgger Kaicy - Jaik Macdgal - Rui Sharling - Philip sorn - Eric Pumpkin VILLAINS: - Henry Becknell - Hoister Blane - Captain Grantz - Curse Eldet
